price: Ergasii guyyaan murtii maal akka ta'e maaltu si beeksise?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
